Class Soldier

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • ClubAbstractEntity
                • Person
                  • Soldier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class Soldier
extends Person
    This class extends Person and inherits all of the basic fundementals of a person. In addition it will take care of every other Soldier aspect that the Person does not have.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Soldier()
      Empty constructor - uses the 5 parameter costructor to initialize an empty entity.
      Soldier(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String surname, java.lang.String tel, java.lang.String personalNum)
      This 5 parameter constructor calls the parent constructor for initializing the basic Person field, than it initializes the rest (using: ClubAbstractEntity.addToCenter(java.awt.Component), ClubAbstractEntity.createGenericStrikeLabel(), ClubAbstractEntity.createGenericTextField(java.lang.String), ClubAbstractEntity.createGenericRow(java.lang.String, javax.swing.JTextField, javax.swing.JLabel))

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void commit()
      commit simply calls the father's Person.commit() which writes the text fileds to the actual data base.
      boolean match(java.lang.String key)
      This method is responsible for the searching and matching (id and personal num)
      protected void rollBack()
      This method is used for pressing cancel while changing a soldiers information if cancel was pressed nothing should be saved - therefore this method is invoked and makes sure that that the valid data that is already in the database will be set back to the text fields.
      protected boolean validateData()
      This method is used to validate the fields of the soldiers window.

      • Soldier

        public Soldier()
        Empty constructor - uses the 5 parameter costructor to initialize an empty entity.

      • Soldier

        public Soldier(java.lang.String id,
               java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.String surname,
               java.lang.String tel,
               java.lang.String personalNum)
        This 5 parameter constructor calls the parent constructor for initializing the basic Person field, than it initializes the rest (using: ClubAbstractEntity.addToCenter(java.awt.Component), ClubAbstractEntity.createGenericStrikeLabel(), ClubAbstractEntity.createGenericTextField(java.lang.String), ClubAbstractEntity.createGenericRow(java.lang.String, javax.swing.JTextField, javax.swing.JLabel))
        Parameters:
        id - The actual soldier personal id.
        name - The name of the soldier
        surname - The last name of the soldier
        tel - The phone number of the soldier
        personalNum - The personal number of the soldier.

    • Method Detail

      • match

        public boolean match(java.lang.String key)
        This method is responsible for the searching and matching (id and personal num)
        Overrides:
        match in class Person
        Parameters:
        key - the key to match to
        Returns:
        true if the id or personalnum was matched to the key, else returns false.

      • validateData

        protected boolean validateData()
        This method is used to validate the fields of the soldiers window. It calls the super's Person.validateData() for the common fields of it and its father. If it went successfuly than we validate the last field - personalNum. if a validation of the format failed a red label will appear in the right side of the textfield, if an existing validation failed a message will be shows via NightClubMgmtApp.existsValidate(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, ClubAbstractEntity) method.
        Overrides:
        validateData in class Person
        Returns:
        true if a validation went successfully and false otherwise.

      • commit

        protected void commit()
        commit simply calls the father's Person.commit() which writes the text fileds to the actual data base. than writes the soldier id to the data base.
        Overrides:
        commit in class Person

      • rollBack

        protected void rollBack()
        This method is used for pressing cancel while changing a soldiers information if cancel was pressed nothing should be saved - therefore this method is invoked and makes sure that that the valid data that is already in the database will be set back to the text fields. It uses the supers Person.rollBack() method.
        Overrides:
        rollBack in class Person
